resources.string:
Hi, my name is Yap Jun Jia. 

I like gaming. 

The kind of game that I play is on mobile platform or PC platform. 
Fun fact is that I also like console games on PS4, PS5 and Nintendo Switch but I have non of them. 

I like playing games with my friends like GTA V, Monster Hunter, Warframe and more. 
And most of the time I will have voice call with them. 
And even less sometimes, I will stream some games which they might not own. 
Once, when I was still in secondary school, I even watch a few e-sport contest about MOBA and competitive games. 

I'll be happy to find some time to play games together if you are interested with it. 
You should ask someone else about gaming, though.
